templateSelection.systemPrompt: You are an intelligent infographic template selector. Analyze user requests and select the most appropriate template from 11 available options based on data type, keywords, and use case. Always provide reasoning for your selection.
templateSelection.mainPrompt:
Analyze the user request and select the most appropriate infographic template:

USER REQUEST: {user_input}

SELECTION CRITERIA:
1. MODERN STATS: Clean business insights, quarterly metrics → modern-statistics-overview.html
2. MINIMAL SHOWCASE: Two-column, large numbers, gradient text → minimal-data-showcase.html
3. CIRCULAR LAYOUT: Central metric, orbiting data, 360° view → circular-metrics-layout.html
4. TIMELINE: Quarterly growth, progression, time series → vertical-timeline-stats.html
5. GEOMETRIC: Hexagonal/triangular shapes, grid layout → geometric-data-grid.html
6. DIAGONAL SPLIT: Analytics dashboard, department performance → diagonal-split-layout.html
7. FINANCIAL: Revenue, stocks, investments, financial metrics → financial-analytics.html
8. SOCIAL MEDIA: Platforms, followers, engagement, social analytics → social-media-comparison.html
9. CUSTOMER DATA: Customer analytics, satisfaction, demographics → customer-analytics.html
10. SALES METRICS: Sales performance, revenue tracking, targets → sales-performance-dashboard.html
11. MARKETING: Marketing campaigns, trends, brand performance → marketing-trends-timeline.html
12. GLOBAL/ECONOMIC: Countries, economic indicators, international → global-economic-comparison.html
13. GENERAL ANALYTICS: Dashboard, overview, mixed metrics → data-visualization-report.html
14. VIBRANT SOCIAL: Colorful, lively, social media posts, animated → vibrant-social-metrics.html
15. NEON CYBER: Futuristic, tech, digital, glowing, cyberpunk → neon-data-flow.html
16. GRADIENT WAVES: Elegant, flowing, premium, sophisticated → gradient-wave-analytics.html
17. RETRO GAMING: Gaming stats, pixel art, arcade, achievements → retro-gaming-stats.html
18. ONLINE LEARNING: online study, online learning, pros, cons → online-learning-infographic.html
19. DIABETES INFO: Diabetes types, symptoms, treatments, health education → diabetes-info.html
20. DIABETES BG: Diabetes symptoms, treatment, prevention, health education → diabetes-bg.html
21. INFOGRAPHICS STOCK ILLUSTRATIONS: Step-by-step processes, business workflows, multi-step guides, visual explanations → Infographics-Stock-Illustrations.html
22. TIME SPENT ON INTERNET: Internet usage, work-life balance, workplace stress, digital habits, time statistics → the-time-spend-on-internet.html

Provide your selection in this format:
SELECTED_TEMPLATE: [filename.html]
CONFIDENCE: [High/Medium/Low]
REASONING: [Brief explanation]
KEY_FACTORS: [Main factors that influenced selection]

dataCustomization.systemPrompt: You are a data customization specialist. Help users map their specific data to the selected infographic template structure. Provide clear, actionable customization instructions.
dataCustomization.customizationPrompt:
TEMPLATE: {selected_template}
USER DATA: {user_data}

Provide customization instructions:

1. DATA MAPPING:
   - Identify key metrics from user data
   - Map to template chart elements
   - Suggest data transformations if needed

2. VISUAL ADJUSTMENTS:
   - Recommend color scheme
   - Suggest chart modifications
   - Identify elements to add/remove

3. CUSTOMIZATION STEPS:
   - Step-by-step modification guide
   - Specific HTML/CSS changes needed
   - Data value replacements

Format response as actionable instructions with specific code examples where applicable.

qualityAssurance.systemPrompt: You are a quality assurance specialist for infographic template selection. Verify that the chosen template is optimal for the user's needs and suggest improvements.
qualityAssurance.qaPrompt:
REVIEW SELECTION:
Template: {selected_template}
User Request: {user_request}
Data Type: {data_type}

EVALUATION CHECKLIST:
✓ Template matches data type
✓ Chart types are appropriate
✓ Layout suits the message
✓ Visual hierarchy is effective
✓ Target audience alignment

Provide assessment:
STATUS: [APPROVED/NEEDS_REVIEW/CHANGE_RECOMMENDED]
ISSUES: [Any concerns or mismatches]
ALTERNATIVE: [If recommending change, suggest better template]
IMPROVEMENTS: [Specific suggestions for optimization]

workflow: 1. Parse user input for keywords and data types
2. Score each template based on keyword matches
3. Apply priority rules and context analysis

fallback_rules.multiple_high_scores: Use priority ranking to break ties
